`$=customJS.dv_funcs.mentionedIn(dv)`

#### <s class="topic-title">[[Swadhisthana Chakra]]</s>

Situated around the pubic bone or [[sacrum]], it governs relationships and connections.

**See**:: [[Chakra]]
*`$=customJS.dv_funcs.outlinedIn(dv, this)`*
